TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Clock extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 維護 的執行階段計時狀態。

span.span: Maintains run-time timing state for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A ，單獨使用時，實際上並不進行任何項目以外的其他描述一段時間。A , by itself, doesn't actually do anything other than describe a segment of time. 它是時間軸的實際執行工作的物件： 它會維護的時間軸的計時相關執行階段狀態。It's the timeline's object that does the real work: it maintains timing-related run-time state for the timeline. 在大部分情況下，時鐘會自動為時間軸建立。In most cases, a clock is created automatically for your timeline. 當您使用建立的動畫或方法中，時鐘會自動為您的時間軸和動畫建立並套用到其目標的屬性。When you animate by using a or the method, clocks are automatically created for your timelines and animations and applied to their targeted properties. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 使用分鏡腳本建立屬性的動畫](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-by-using-a-storyboard.md)並[如何： 以動畫顯示屬性而不使用分鏡腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-without-using-a-storyboard.md)。For examples, see [How to: Animate a Property by Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-by-using-a-storyboard.md) and [How to: Animate a Property Without Using a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-animate-a-property-without-using-a-storyboard.md). 您也可以建立明確地使用方法。You can also create a explicitly by using the method. 在耗用大量效能的情況下，例如以動畫顯示大量類似物件，管理您自己使用可提供效能優勢。In performance-intensive scenarios, such as animating large numbers of similar objects, managing your own use can provide performance benefits. 時鐘會排列在符合的結構所建立的物件樹狀結構。Clocks are arranged in trees that match the structure of the objects tree from which they are created. 這類的計時樹狀結構的根時鐘可以以互動方式操作 （暫停、 繼續、 已停止，依此類推） 藉由擷取其。The root clock of such a timing tree can be interactively manipulated (paused, resumed, stopped, and so on) by retrieving its . 無法直接控制非根時鐘。Non-root clocks cannot be directly controlled. 一旦建立，時鐘不能修改 （但可以操作）。Once created, a clock cannot be modified (but it can be manipulated). ## 使用時間軸的計時器Using a Timeline as a Timer 與其相關聯的事件處理常式時，才會進行時刻表的時鐘或 (如果是物件) 相關聯的屬性。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event handler associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 因此 （和其他人），不建議您改用的計時器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

span.para: 在衍生的類別應該實作如果他們想要修改這個時鐘時間的流動方式。衍生的類別可以用來執行額外的工作，時鐘重複、 略過、 搜尋、 開始、 暫停、 繼續執行，或停止時藉由覆寫， ，和方法。

Derived classes should implement if they want to modify how time flows for this clock. Derived classes can be made to do additional work when the clock repeats, skips, seeks, begins, pauses, resumes, or stops by overriding the , , and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline timeline) cil managed

param.name: timeline
param.span: 應在其中建構這個時鐘的 。

span.span: The from which this clock should be constructed.

param.span: 如果時鐘已經存在，就不會為任何子 物件建立時鐘。

span.span: Clocks are not created for any child objects, if they exist.

summary.span: 使用指定的 做為範本，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified as a template.

summary.span: 新的 物件沒有子系。

span.span: The new object has no children.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler

summary.span: 當這個時鐘完成播放時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this clock has completely finished playing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個時鐘是時鐘樹狀結構的根時鐘，它已完成播放後結束其使用中的持續時間 （其中包含重複項目） 和其所有子系已達到其作用中的持續時間結束。If this clock is the root clock of a clock tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active duration (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active durations. 如果這個時鐘是子系時鐘，則會視為完全結束播放它所屬達到時鐘樹狀結構的根時鐘結束其使用中的持續時間和其所有子系時鐘已完成播放時。If this clock is a child clock, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root clock of the clock tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active duration and all its child clocks have finished playing. 停止時鐘，不會觸發已完成的事件，但前移至其填滿期間。Stopping a clock does not trigger its completed event, but advancing it to its fill period does.

value.span: 如果這是根時鐘則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: A if this is a root clock; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有根時鐘可以以互動方式控制。Only root clocks can be interactively controlled.

span.span: The rate at which this clock's time is current progressing, compared to real-world time.

value.span: 如果已停止時鐘，則這個屬性會傳回 。

span.span: If the clock is stopped, this property returns .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在更新時鐘的速度時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock's speed is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 暫停、 繼續、 反轉、 加速、 減速、 搜尋、 停止或變更時鐘的互動速度使用觸發此事件。Pausing, resuming, reversing, accelerating, decelerating, seeking, stopping, or changing a clock's interactive speed using a triggers this event. 雖然這個事件發生時屬性會變成無效，也不一定表示屬性已變更。Although this event occurs when the property becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the property changed.

span.span: Gets the current global time, as established by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] timing system.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 計時系統的目前全域時間。

span.span: The current global time for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] timing system.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentIteration As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> CurrentIteration { Nullable<int> get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得這個時鐘的目前反覆項目。

span.span: Get the current iteration of this clock.

value.span: 這個時鐘在其目前使用中週期內的目前反覆運算，如果時鐘已停止，則為 。

span.span: This clock's current iteration within its current active period, or if this clock is stopped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時鐘的第一個反覆項目有值為 1。A clock's first iteration has a value of 1. 如果這個時鐘的時間軸設定`true`，完整的反覆項目都包含一個轉寄反向組，不只是其中一個區段。If this clock's timeline has an setting of `true`, a full iteration consists of a forward-reverse pair, not just one of these segments. 其目前反覆項目，不論搜尋時鐘會傳回其目前的反覆項目為 1。Regardless of its current iteration, seeking a clock returns its current iteration to 1. 重新啟動時鐘也會傳回其目前的反覆項目為 1。Restarting a clock also returns its current iteration to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentProgress As Nullable(Of Double)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得這個 在其目前反覆項目內的目前進度。

span.span: Gets the current progress of this within its current iteration.

value.span: 如果這個時鐘是 則為 ，如果這個時鐘在使用中且其 的 是 ，則為 0.0，否則為介於 0.0 與 1.0 之間的值，表示這個時鐘在其目前反覆項目內的目前進度。

span.span: if this clock is , or 0.0 if this clock is active and its has a of ; otherwise, a value between 0.0 and 1.0 that indicates the current progress of this Clock within its current iteration.

value.span: 值 0.0 表示沒有進度，而值 1.0 表示時鐘已到目前反覆運算的結尾。

span.span: A value of 0.0 indicates no progress, and a value of 1.0 indicates that the clock is at the end of its current iteration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值會指出藉由標準化這個時鐘之。The value of this property indicates the normalized by the of this clock's . 是一個時鐘具有為 1.0。A clock that is has a of 1.0. ## 使用時間軸的計時器Using a Timeline as a Timer 與其相關聯的事件處理常式時，才會進行時刻表的時鐘或 (如果是物件) 相關聯的屬性。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 因此 （和其他人），不建議您改用的計時器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意時鐘的屬性不會告訴您是否已暫停。Note the clock's property doesn't tell you whether it's paused. 若要判斷是否要暫停的時鐘，請使用屬性。To determine whether a clock is paused, use the property. 當這個屬性的值變更時發生。The occurs whenever the value of this property changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentStateInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 時鐘的 屬性更新時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock's property is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，當您想要收到通知，如果時鐘啟動時，停止或填滿。Use the event when you want to be notified if when the clock starts, stops, or fills. 的參數事件處理常式是驗證為無效的狀態。The parameter of the event handler is the whose state was invalidated. 暫停不會變更其。Pausing a does not change its . 若要收到時鐘會變成暫停時，使用事件。To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the event. 雖然就會發生此事件時會變成無效，也不一定表示變更： ，從切換來，然後再回到在相同刻度將會引發此事件引發，但其屬性實際上並不會變更。Although this event occurs when the becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the changed: a that switches from to and then back to in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its property won't actually change.

span.span: Returns **true** if the has its own external source for time, which may require synchronization with the timing system; otherwise, **false**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 媒體使用播放內舉例說明建立會具有外部時間來源 （例如視訊剪輯） 可能需要與其他時間軸內同步。Media being played using within a is an example of creating a that would have an external time source (a video clip for example) which may require synchronization with other timelines within the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information.
